song.title: Savior of Worlds (feat. mom)
song.info:
9th at Assembly 2016 listening music compo
tools: FL Studio 12 & plugins (including VST guitars)
-- Lyrics (provided by the artist):
Sometimes I’m a hero Sometimes a villain But most of the time I just happen to save the world
Some say it is stupid A waste of my time But for me it's a way to escape the chains that bind me to this world
I fly from a realm to another I cry when it ends and then start all over again
I live in a virtual world But for me it is real I give it all I have
I fight for good Sometimes for evil But in the end I'm a savior of worlds Yes, I'm a savior of worlds
[Instrumental break]
I live in a virtual world But for me it is real I give it all I have
I fight for good Sometimes for evil But in the end I'm a savior of worlds Yes, I'm a savior of worlds
